template.title: Feathers SDK Desktop Project (MacOS, Windows)
template.name: Feathers SDK Desktop Project (MacOS, Windows)
template.description: Create project with Feathers SDK for desktop application. This can be used to generate .AIR, .EXE (Windows only) and .DMG (OSX) installers.

template.description: Create project with Feathers SDK for mobile devices.
